project.objective: The aim of Telly solution is to open new revenue streams for broadcasters, TV networks, sports clubs and to increase the real-time engagement with their audiences and fans. 1.1. Objectives Objectives for the innovation project OB1 – To further develop the second screen mobile application, together with the multiplayer gaming solution, in order to include all interactive features required by the media market to solve all the pains they are facing OB2 - To build a strong business based on a licensing model of the real-time 2nd screen solution. Develop a modular solution, which can be easily customizable and redeployed in a matter of days OB3 – Customize the solution to fit other domains like: publishers, conferences, exhibitions and any other segment that would need a real-time feedback from masses.
project.title: A 2nd screen mobile application solution providing interactive multiplayer game and real-time votingcapabilities, based on TV content, to better engage TV audiences and sports fans. - TELLY
